title: Why does my LoL Client crash when i start a game
body:
So this started about 2 months ago and it's driving me nuts...
i open the game and go play it and then when we should enter the game it crashes.
i open the game again and it says that it needs to be patched again so i patch it and it takes about 2min...
then i need to log in and reconnect and i come into the game about 3-4min... at that time they remake and i get ban
Rito i got ban like this 4th time now (20 min ban before every game for 5 times)
please Rito and others help me out with this problem

replies.body: It sounds like your game is failing to render, which can be caused by a few factors like bad drivers, game files, or even hardware.  Go over each step in this [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure your PC and game is tuned up for league.  I suggest testing it out in custom games to prevent further penalties.  Hopefully, that will get things fixed up!

2nd time in 2 days bugslpat error. When I restarted the client it goes through patching and then reloads. The game worked 4 times in a row without any error and then this. Don't think it's my drivers cause then it would have done it on the first game. 
The sad thing is that your leavebuster software fails to take this into account.
